DataElement.preferredName: Imaging Research Clinical Study Consent Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether permission was given to conduct a systemic investigation using technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Imaging Technique Research Activity Clinical Study Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._Permission to do something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

Concepts.definition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.
Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

Property.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/6/18 tt released for use.  Created for EA8153, 01/09/2018 JG

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I choose to take part in the
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the imaging study and will have the experimental NaF PET/CT scans.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAE161
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient provided written informed consent to participate in the imaging study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: OPEN Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the imaging study and will have the diffusion weighted MRI scans.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAI142 - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to undergo the optional clinical FDG-PET/CT imaging scan prior to the experimental imaging study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance - A211801
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to take part in the imaging study and will have the XtremeCT scan.
